Sentencas: In the shipping industry, solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) are a much-discussed technology due to their high energy efficiency, fuel versatility, and emissions reduction potential.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: In contrast to internal combustion engines, modular SOFC units allow for distributed system configurations without drastically reducing the overall efficiency.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: Decentralizing the power system with regard to the electrical consumers' demands reduces both grid size and transmission losses, leading to a reduction of investment and operating costs.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: Additionally, a modular approach significantly benefits required redundancy aspects.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: A case study based on a cruise ship with nine fire zones is used to quantify the advantages of a distributed approach from an economic point of view.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: For this, a design optimization with variable installation location is conducted both with and without component failure considerations.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: Compared to a central configuration, annual transmission system costs in a distributed approach are reduced by 76% without and 55% with component failure consideration.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: However, the cost reduction potential proves to be small compared to other matters of expense.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions

Sentencas: The modular system characteristic ensures that minor modifications suffice for component redundancy, resulting in an investment cost increase of less than 2% for both central and distributed configurations.
Titulo: Optimal Design of a Distributed Ship Power System with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells under the Consideration of Component Malfunctions
